alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 3:01AM CDT until April 23 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rooks County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Smith County in north central Kansas... Western Osborne County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Phillips County in north central Kansas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 300 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Glade to near Stockton to 7 miles southwest of Zurich, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Stockton around 305 AM CDT. Woodston around 315 AM CDT. Alton and Codell around 320 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Natoma. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
